Uses of Class
net.juniper.netconf.XML

    • Uses of XML in net.juniper.netconf

      Methods in net.juniper.netconf that return XML 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XML XML.addPath(String path)
      Append multiple elements under the active element of XML object, by specifying the path.The bottommost hierarchy element now becomes the active element.
      XML XML.append(String element)
      Append an element under the active element of XML object.
      XML XML.append(String element, Map<String,String> map)
